title: Are iPhone picture good for quality print? - Quora

response.answer_text: The latest iphone comes with 12Megapixels camera , unless you want to print it really big ,it gives good quality . Below is an image for pixels and quality comparison  Image source : How Big Can You Print with Your Camera’s Megapixels? Hope it helps !!
Question, in two parts. Can you print photos taken with an iPhone: Yes Are they good enough to print: That’s up to you. I’ll take the 5th.
